lines.text: So you take it and you pass it to the person sitting next to you until the joint gets passed around and it's very, very small. That is called a *roach*; and I will collect those.
Uh, yes, uh, I think we all had, uh, drinks with, uh, dinner, uh... dope and, uh, the alcohol... mix?

[to Larry, after Lynn has taken off the top of her dress]
My compliments to the chef.

[instructing the SPFC how to smoke a joint]
Now the other thing that you must remember, is that after you inhale, you take the joint and you pass it to the person sitting next to you. Do not, repeat, *do not* hold onto the joint. This is called *bogarting* the joint, and it is very rude.
Now are there any other questions before we light up?
Yes; you said we should count to ten. How fast should we count?
Just fast enough so that you don't pass out.

[to woman who is taking repeated short puffs on her joint]
Hey, lady! Don't cheat!
I have trouble with my windpipe.
